english.segment1: On my own volition. I pound my head against the wall. And I don't hear it when you call. Tumbling down the stairway. I still try to make the phone. I call you back but your not home
english.segment2: Full of good intention. I read the paper to myself. I try to act like someone else. Barely past the headline. I still remember what you said. I'll hold it in until I'm dead
english.segment3: I best be getting on with this. But I can't get you out my head. Ten times a day when I stop to pray. I ask that you would let me in
english.segment4: Beading on the window. The weather underneath my eyes. Is it rain or am I crying. TV in the distance. Am I awake or still asleep. I feel a hand against my cheek
english.segment5: I best be getting on with this. But I can't get you out of my head. Ten times a day when I stop to pray. I ask that you would let me in
